plugins.name: QR Code Generator
plugins.description:
Generate QR codes without leaving Figma. Customize with your own link, logo and colors.


This plugin creates static QR codes in SVG format, so they can be resized without losing quality. It uses RecodeQR to generate the image (no account needed). The QR codes are fully self-contained: they don’t rely on our service and they’re yours forever.


Tip: To scan QR codes you can use the camera app on iOS, or you can also inspect them online.
plugins.tagline: Create QR codes without leaving Figma

126163.name: QR Code Generator
126163.description:
Generate QR codes without leaving Figma. Customize with your own link, logo and colors.


This plugin creates static QR codes in SVG format, so they can be resized without losing quality. It uses RecodeQR to generate the image (no account needed). The QR codes are fully self-contained: they don’t rely on our service and they’re yours forever.


Tip: To scan QR codes you can use the camera app on iOS, or you can also inspect them online.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires network access to RecodeQR's API to generate QR codes. No user data is stored.

126163.release_notes: Fixed dark mode, improve community details
126163.tagline: Create QR codes without leaving Figma

plugins.name: Find & Replace Anything
plugins.description:
Search for anything on your page and replace it with anything you want!


A powerful tool for finding and replacing styles! Works with components, instances and library styles. Especially helpful to align parameters across projects in bulk like auto layout or library styles for your pixel perfect design.


Plugin is in active development. Therefore, any feedback is appreciated! Like our plugin? Leave a heart!


Full feature list:


Library & local Styles

  1. Fonts
  2. Colors
  3. Effects
  4. Grids


Variables (search only)

  1. Color Variable
  2. Number Variable
  3. String Variable
  4. Boolean Variable


Shape & Frame

  1. Name
  2. Width
  3. Height
  4. Position X
  5. Position Y
  6. Rotation
  7. Constrain Proportions
  8. Clip content


Text

  1. Text
  2. Font Size
  3. Paragraphs Spacing
  4. Paragraph Indent
  5. Text Decoration
  6. Text Case
  7. Text Resizing
  8. Text Align Horizontal
  9. Text Align Vertical


Layer

  1. Blend Mode
  2. Opacity
  3. Visibility


Stroke

  1. Stroke Align
  2. Stroke Weight
  3. Stroke Join


Auto Layout

  1. Layout mode
  2. Spacing between items
  3. Paddings
plugins.tagline: Search for anything on your page and replace it with anything you want!

  1. Maintain a product's UX consistency across projects.
  2. Design System (Global & Domain Libraries) to grow to meet evolving needs.
  3. Designers & Domains to make visible their progression in the practice and use of Design System to improve UX consistency and work efficiency.

plugins.name: Move Outside
plugins.description:
A plugin designed to move any elements outside of their current frames and place them at the top of the hierarchy while retaining their original position relative to the entire page. The plugin offers two modes:


  1. Default - Moves selected single or multiple elements to the top of the page’s layer hierarchy.
  2. Locked Target - Moves selected single or multiple elements into another specified layer. The Locked Target mode supports moving into frames, frames with autolayout, and sections. If the Locked Target is an autolayout frame, users can choose whether the moved frames should retain their original page position using absolute positioning or adapt to the autolayout.


This plugin stands out from others with similar functionality by offering a full interface that enables continuous management of complex layer structures.
plugins.tagline: A plugin used to move elements to the top of the layer hierarchy or to other frames/sections.

106901.name: Move Outside
106901.description:
A plugin designed to move any elements outside of their current frames and place them at the top of the hierarchy while retaining their original position relative to the entire page. The plugin offers two modes:


  1. Default - Moves selected single or multiple elements to the top of the page’s layer hierarchy.
  2. Locked Target - Moves selected single or multiple elements into another specified layer. The Locked Target mode supports moving into frames, frames with autolayout, and sections. If the Locked Target is an autolayout frame, users can choose whether the moved frames should retain their original page position using absolute positioning or adapt to the autolayout.


This plugin stands out from others with similar functionality by offering a full interface that enables continuous management of complex layer structures.
106901.tagline: A plugin used to move elements to the top of the layer hierarchy or to other frames/sections.

plugins.name: Simple Ruler
plugins.description:
📐 四辺定規システム

  1. パネルの上下左右すべての辺に精密な目盛りを表示
  2. ピクセル単位での正確な測定が可能


🔍 自動ズーム対応

  1. Figmaのズーム率変化をリアルタイム検知
  2. ズーム率に応じて目盛り間隔を自動調整
  3. 常に実際のピクセル値を正確に表示
  4. ズーム率表示の場合は、クリックすることでデザインデータを等倍に


📏 リサイズ機能

  1. 8方向のリサイズハンドル（四隅 + 各辺中央）
  2. ドラッグ操作で自由にサイズ変更可能
  3. リサイズ中も目盛りがリアルタイム更新
  4. 邪魔にならないように、折りたたんで端に寄せることが可能（最小化／展開）


📊 情報表示パネル

  1. 現在のサイズを「幅 XXXpx × 高さ XXXpx」形式で表示
  2. ズーム率を「実寸大」「ズーム率 XXX%」形式で表示
plugins.tagline: プラグインウインドウでデザインデータ内のオブジェクトのサイズを直感的に計測できます。

plugins.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.

accepted.name: Ruhul
accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

135187.description:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.
135187.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

plugins.name: 批量字号行高对齐
plugins.description:
## 🎯 核心功能

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，分别应用最适合的行高倍数

- **统一行高模式**：为所有选中文本应用相同的行高倍数，精确控制排版节奏

- **批量处理**：支持选中 Frame、Group 等容器，一键处理内部所有文本图层


## ✨ 使用场景

- 快速统一设计稿中的文字行高

- 优化阅读体验，单行标题紧凑，段落文本舒适

- 批量调整多个页面的文字排版


## 🔧 默认设置

- **单行文本**：1.0 倍（紧凑排版）

- **段落文本**：1.68 倍（黄金比例，舒适阅读）

- **支持自定义调整**：0.1–5 倍


## 🆕 更新日志 v2.0

- 新增智能识别功能，自动区分单行和段落文本

- 新增统一行高模式，满足不同设计需求

- 优化 UI 界面，操作更直观

- 支持自定义行高倍数（0.1–5 倍）

- 行高计算采用向下取整，确保像素完美对齐


---


## 🎯 Core Features

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line and paragraph text, applying the optimal line height multiplier for each.

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all selected text layers for precise typographic control.

- **Batch Processing**: Supports selection of Frames, Groups, and other containers to apply changes to all nested text layers in one click.


## ✨ Use Cases

- Quickly unify text line height across your design

- Improve readability: tighter single-line headings, more breathable paragraph spacing

- Batch-adjust text layouts across multiple pages


## 🔧 Default Settings

- **Single-line text**: 1.0× (compact layout)

- **Paragraph text**: 1.68× (golden ratio for comfortable reading)

- **Supports custom adjustment** from 0.1× to 5.0×


## 🆕 Update Log - v2.0

- Added smart detection for single-line vs. paragraph text

- Introduced uniform line height mode for consistent styling

- Improved UI for a more intuitive experience

- Custom line height range support (0.1×–5.0×)

- Line height calculation now uses floor rounding for pixel-perfect alignment
plugins.tagline: 批量字号行高对齐

plugins.name: Airlogo
plugins.description:
Designing travel apps, booking websites, or aviation dashboards? Airline Logos makes your workflow faster and cleaner by giving you instant access to hundreds of up-to-date, high-quality airline logos—right inside Figma.


Easily search by airline name, IATA/ICAO code, or country, and drag logos directly into your designs. All logos are optimized for digital use, SVG-based, and consistently styled to save you time and ensure visual harmony across your project.


Perfect for:


Travel & aviation UI/UX designers

Booking platforms and flight aggregators

Prototypes that need real-world branding

No more hunting down logos or worrying about outdated assets. With Airline Logos, your design stays current and cohesive—effortlessly.
plugins.tagline: Library of Airline Logos

plugins.name: Detach Aliases
plugins.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

131967.name: Detach Aliases
131967.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.
131967.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

plugins.name: UnfigShadow
plugins.description:
UnfigShadow - Advanced Shadowing for Figma is a professional plugin that brings realistic, multi-layered shadow generation into your design workflow. Unlike Figma’s native shadow tools, this plugin lets you control shadow distance, direction, blur, opacity decay, steps, and color—all through a clean and intuitive interface.


Create complex light and depth effects in seconds without needing to manually stack shadow layers. Ideal for UI/UX designers, component libraries, and anyone seeking to add realistic depth to their interfaces.
plugins.tagline: Advanced Shadowing for Figma

128325.name: UnfigShadow
128325.description:
UnfigShadow - Advanced Shadowing for Figma is a professional plugin that brings realistic, multi-layered shadow generation into your design workflow. Unlike Figma’s native shadow tools, this plugin lets you control shadow distance, direction, blur, opacity decay, steps, and color—all through a clean and intuitive interface.


Create complex light and depth effects in seconds without needing to manually stack shadow layers. Ideal for UI/UX designers, component libraries, and anyone seeking to add realistic depth to their interfaces.

plugins.name: Forma
plugins.description:
🎨 FORMA: Design Systems in Minutes, Not Months! 🚀


Ever tried creating a design system from scratch? It's like trying to fold a fitted sheet – seemingly impossible and will probably make you cry. 😭


Forma swoops in to save your sanity with magical design system generation powers:


✨ COLOR SORCERY

• Create gorgeous Pantone-style color palettes

• Generate perfect shades that actually make sense

• Turn chaotic color choices into harmonious design languages


📝 TYPOGRAPHY WIZARDRY

• Conjure complete typography hierarchies faster than you can say "Comic Sans is unacceptable"

• 9 perfectly balanced text styles that your design lead will actually approve

• Font fallbacks that won't make your developers rage-quit


🧩 DESIGN TOKENS

• Spacing systems that maintain mathematical harmony

• Size tokens that scale beautifully across devices

• Consistent radius values (because inconsistent corner radii are criminal)


⚠️ BETA ALERT ⚠️

This release is a preview of Forma's powers - not for production just yet! We're still brewing up more magical features like component generation, brand voice integration, and design consistency checks.


Created with ❤️ (and a lot of coffee) by a designer who got tired of rebuilding the same foundations over and over again.
plugins.tagline: Design System Generator

129323.description:

129323.release_notes: Bug Fix: Typography stylesheet generation error fixed.

plugins.name: Numeric Variable Checker
plugins.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
plugins.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

126488.name: Numeric Variable Checker
126488.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
126488.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

plugins.name: Component Request
plugins.description: Request component ist a simple tool to generate component request sheets for your design system team. Just add all your states and information to your new component and generate. Also you can use the tool for existing components to generate update requests.
plugins.tagline: Generate a component request sheet for your design system team

139153.name: Component Request
139153.description: Request component ist a simple tool to generate component request sheets for your design system team. Just add all your states and information to your new component and generate. Also you can use the tool for existing components to generate update requests.
139153.tagline: Generate a component request sheet for your design system team

plugins.name: SPLOC - Selected the parent of component layer
plugins.description:
A plugin for Figma that automatically selects the parent component when any child within the component or its instance is selected.


Main features:

  1. Automatic detection and selection of the parent component
  2. Automatic collapse of the selected component
  3. On/Off switch to enable/disable functionality
  4. Memories the last selection to prevent cyclic selections


How to use:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Launch the plugin (it is active by default)
  3. Select any element within the component or its instance
  4. The plugin will automatically:
  5. Finds the parent component
  6. Select it
  7. Flattens the structure of the component


Interface:

  1. Compact window with ON/OFF switch
  2. The switch allows you to temporarily disable plugin functionality


Technical features:

  1. Works with components (COMPONENT) and their instances (INSTANCE)
  2. Prevents cyclic selections
  3. Optimized for working with large files
  4. Minimal impact on Figma performance


Application:

Ideal for working with large component systems where switching between children and parent components is often required.


----------------------------------------



Плагин для Figma, который автоматически выделяет родительский компонент при выборе любого дочернего элемента внутри компонента или его экземпляра.


Основные возможности:

  1. Автоматическое определение и выбор родительского компонента
  2. Автоматическое схлопывание (collapse) выбранного компонента
  3. Переключатель On/Off для включения/отключения функционала
  4. Запоминание последнего выбора для предотвращения циклических выделений


Как использовать:

  1. Установите плагин
  2. Запустите плагин (он активен по умолчанию)
  3. Выберите любой элемент внутри компонента или его экземпляра
  4. Плагин автоматически:
  5. Найдет родительский компонент
  6. Выделит его
  7. Схлопнет структуру компонента


Интерфейс:

  1. Компактное окно с переключателем ON/OFF
  2. Переключатель позволяет временно отключить функционал плагина


Технические особенности:

  1. Работает с компонентами (COMPONENT) и их экземплярами (INSTANCE)
  2. Предотвращает циклические выделения
  3. Оптимизирован для работы с большими файлами
  4. Минимальное влияние на производительность Figma


Применение:

Идеально подходит для работы с большими компонентными системами, где часто требуется переключение между дочерними элементами и родительскими компонентами.
plugins.tagline: Automatically selects parent component when child layer is selected

plugins.name: DesignBoost
plugins.description:
Plugin Description

This Figma plugin integrates with Qingmu Gallery, allowing users to access and utilize its extensive image database directly within Figma. Users can search and filter images based on tags and names. The plugin displays a list of matching images, and with a simple click, users can place and edit the images in their Figma projects.
plugins.tagline: DesignBoost

135596.name: DesignBoost
135596.description:
Plugin Description

This Figma plugin integrates with Qingmu Gallery, allowing users to access and utilize its extensive image database directly within Figma. Users can search and filter images based on tags and names. The plugin displays a list of matching images, and with a simple click, users can place and edit the images in their Figma projects.

plugins.name: Sizr
plugins.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
plugins.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

111068.name: Sizr
111068.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
111068.release_notes:
Support for Components
Added:
- The plugin now supports resizing elements based on the grid of a parent `COMPONENT` in addition to a `FRAME`.
- Automatically detects whether the parent is a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a valid grid layout.
- Displays appropriate notifications if resizing is restricted (e.g., when dealing with a master component).

Fixed:
- Improved error handling and user feedback for unsupported parent types or missing grid layouts.

How to Use:
1. Select an element within a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a grid.
2. Trigger the plugin to resize compatible elements based on the grid layout.
111068.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

plugins.name: batchy
plugins.description:
batchy is a helper tool to make your exports more comfortable. Instead of just using the layer name and getting the layer size, you will now be able to write your own asset name dynamically with the help of export tokens and choosing between layer size or screen size for your assets.


Features

  1. dynamic asset names with several export tokens like: layers, date, file, scaling, index, user, top-level frame name,
  2. export assets in layer or screen size (top-level frame)
  3. export your current selection
  4. export from an asset list
  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
plugins.tagline: Export your designs with dynamic name behaviors.

123462.name: batchy
123462.description:
batchy is a helper tool to make your exports more comfortable. Instead of just using the layer name and getting the layer size, you will now be able to write your own asset name dynamically with the help of export tokens and choosing between layer size or screen size for your assets.


Features

  1. dynamic asset names with several export tokens like: layers, date, file, scaling, index, user, top-level frame name,
  2. export assets in layer or screen size (top-level frame)
  3. export your current selection
  4. export from an asset list
  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
123462.release_notes:
v1.2.2

**Bug fixes**
🪲 top-level frame export fixed
🪲 there was an issue when using the same token multiple times

**Additional changes**
✅ tokens now use a $ in the beginning instead of curly brackets in the beginning and the end. Example {{file}} --> $file
✅ $layerName token is now called $layer
✅ $userName token is now called $user
123462.tagline: Export your designs with dynamic name behaviors.

plugins.name: CircleTimer for Figma
plugins.description:
CircleTimer is a minimal, elegant countdown timer that runs inside Figma and FigJam.


Perfect for timeboxing activities like design critiques, interviews, sprints, and solo focus sessions.


• Choose from preset times (5, 15, 30, 60 mins)

• Or set a custom duration in minutes and seconds

• Optional “time’s up” alert

• Clean circular UI styled for Figma

• Escape key to close anytime


Works in both Figma Design and FigJam with zero setup. Designed to feel native to the platform.
plugins.tagline: Simple circular timer for focus sessions, critiques, or workshops in Figma and FigJam.

plugins.name: Gradientify
plugins.description:
Bring vibrant, layered gradients into your Figma designs. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Generate random gradients with an optional noise effect
  2. Paste CSS code from gradientify.app to apply gradients to layers
  3. Use gradients as fill properties for easy customization


Free trial

Try it out up to 5 times in each mode (random generation and CSS import), or unlock unlimited use with a license key.


Thank you for your support

This plugin was built to complement gradientify.app, a free tool for designing and animating gradients for the web. Buying a license helps keep the project going ❤️


Contact me:

If you have questions or comments, please send me a message to rengifo.eder@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Generate and paste CSS gradients to layers as fill properties

plugins.name: Markdown Import
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Google Docsやメモ帳などからコピーしたマークダウン形式のテキストを、Figmaのページ内にインポートするツールです。

「# 見出し1 」「 ## 見出し2」「### 見出し3」「本文」の構造を自動で判別し、それぞれに対応するコンポーネントを選択して挿入することができます。


【主な機能】

  1. マークダウン記法でコピー＆ペースト → 自動でレイアウト生成
  2. 見出し1〜3、本文、それぞれに同一ページ内の任意のコンポーネントを割り当て可能
  3. コンポーネント内のテキストレイヤーを自動で認識し、文字を置換


---


This plugin lets you import markdown-style text into your Figma page directly from Google Docs, Notepad, or any markdown editor.


It automatically parses the structure of your content—such as # Heading 1, ## Heading 2, ### Heading 3, and body text —and allows you to assign custom components for each section during import.


【Key Features】

  1. Paste markdown-formatted text and auto-generate layout in Figma
  2. Assign your preferred components for headings (H1–H3) and body text
  3. Detect and replace text inside the designated layer of each component
plugins.tagline: マークダウンのテキストをコンポーネントを適用してインポート | Import markdown into Figma with component mapping.

135867.description:

plugins.name: Timestamp
plugins.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
plugins.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

138623.name: Renoise AI – Generate Images & Videos using top AI models right in Figma
138623.description:
Renoise lets you generate stunning images and videos directly on your Figma canvas using top-tier AI models like Flux, Ideogram, and Kling. No more jumping between tools — get high-quality visuals exactly where you design.

•🎨 Style your images with any reference

•🎞️ Turn any image into motion with video generation

•🧭 Precisely control image composition with ControlNet

•🔍 Upscale, regenerate, and experiment in context

•💳 No subscriptions — pay only for what you use
138623.tagline: Create faster with on-canvas AI. Pay only for what you use.

plugins.name: Color Palettes
plugins.description:
Color Palettes is a simple and intuitive plugin that helps you instantly generate and apply beautiful color palettes directly within Figma. Whether you're designing a website, mobile app, or branding project, this tool makes it easy to explore harmonious color combinations with ease.


🔹 One-click palette generation

🔹 Multiple color scheme styles (analogous, complementary, etc.)

🔹 Easily copy hex codes or apply colors to your design

🔹 Lightweight and fast


Perfect for UI/UX designers, developers, and creatives looking to save time and stay inspired.


No login or external account required.

accepted.name: Mr inam
accepted.description: Hi there! I'm a skilled UI designer with a 4-year track record of bringing digital visions to life. With a stack of successfully completed projects in mobile...

plugins.tagline: Instantly generate beautiful color palettes for your designs with one click.

plugins.name: Icon Builder
plugins.description:
Icon Builder is a versatile and intuitive Figma plugin that empowers designers and developers to convert their frames, components, and instances into fully customizable, export-ready React components.


Whether you’re refining a design system or crafting animated UI elements, Icon Builder makes scalable icon generation effortless.


👉 Dive deeper or contribute on GitHub: github.com/IvanDF/icon-builder
plugins.tagline: Easily create and customize icons for your projects

plugins.name: Copy Paste Text
plugins.description:
Transfer batches of text across multiple layers from one layout to another — exactly where it used to be done manually.


Features:

  1. Copy → Paste — Standard copy-paste for selected text layers
  2. Paste from clipboard — Paste multi-line text content from external sources
  3. Copy outer text — Copy text from Figma to clipboard for editing outside the project workspace

accepted.name: Alexey Skuratov
accepted.description: I Help scale SaaS and e-commerce products, through new design and functionality. Past: Viasat, Sberbank, Yandex

plugins.tagline: Save time by copying and pasting text layers between layouts where manual transfer is the only optio

plugins.name: ChromaGrab
plugins.description:
ChromaGrab: The Ultimate Colour Extraction & Palette Generator for Figma


Transform any image or selection into a professional colour system with ChromaGrab. Extract, refine, and generate beautiful colour palettes with precision and ease. 🎨


Key Features:


• Instant colour extraction from any image or selection

• Smart colour spectrum generation with customisable saturation

• Automatic colour variable creation with semantic naming

• Drag-and-drop colour organisation

• Seamless gradient generation

• Professional-grade hex colour input with live preview


Whether you're building a design system, creating gradients, or exploring colour variations, ChromaGrab streamlines your colour workflow. Perfect for designers who need quick access to harmonious colour palettes without compromising on quality or flexibility.


Transform your colour workflow today with ChromaGrab – where precision meets creativity.

accepted.name: Karl Koch
accepted.description: Currently building DuckDuckGo, Cosmic, Hand››over, and plugins.run.

plugins.tagline: Extract, refine, and generate beautiful colour palettes from images with precision and ease.
